title: PBE Forum Problems
body:
I can log-in but it tells me to log-in again (never ending loop, it logs me in according to my top Right showing me logged in). Also states that I have to be level 1 to post yada yada.

Needless to say I've a long list of bug reports to give but am unable to comment to make them known for PBE purposes.

http://imgur.com/9bOKi8X

replies.body:
Cleared cache/cookies. Opened Incognito. Disabled all extensions.

http://imgur.com/a/cwybt

http://imgur.com/rmdQYGO

I looked into your PBE account and tried to force a refresh.  Try it again in Incognito and let me know if that helps.

https://yts.ag/assets/images/movies/The_Fifth_Element_Remastered_1997/large-screenshot2.jpg

No dice. I went through the steps a second time as well.
Then I tried using Edge browser *shudder*
Still says I must be level 1 to post.

http://imgur.com/a/3eME8

Guess I'll wait a bit and hope others notice the bugs and get the visibility.

Damn.  Is this only for creating threads?  Can you comment on someone else's post?  In the meantime, you might still be able to use the Bug Icon on the bottom right corner of the client to submit reports.  I'll see if there's anything else we can do in the meantime.

http://i.imgur.com/f3w5zb3.jpg

muahaha After all the restarts and what not (I restarted the computer as well), I was able to comment without being stuck in a login bug and this allowed me to update my level so I could post.

Thanks porocles.

http://imgur.com/a/LLz4b

http://rhuopostale.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/fifth-element-leeloo-nova-white-beam-of-divine-light-still.jpg

I'm glad all is well now!  Btw, that's coming back out to theatres this month don't miss it!
Ill just boot up the VHS and watch it instead :P

Hey!  There might have been an issue with refreshing your account, but the sync should have gone through now.  When you get a chance, try again in Incognito and let me know if it worked this time.  :D

The level 1 issue is normal when posting for the first time, so it may take a bit to sync you up.  The looping thing is odd though, so I'm curious of there's an extension that needs to be disabled.  You might also need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) in case it's preventing you from logging in.  

Let me know if these steps help, super green?
https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1746469644/rubyrhod_400x400.jpg
